meaning: He earned respect from his peers.
example: earn'은 (노동이나 서비스의 대가로) '돈을 벌다' 혹은 (자신의 노력으로) '인정이나 명성을 얻는다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Employees can earn a bonus for exceeding their sales targets.
sentence: You can ____ extra money by working overtime.

meaning: She edited the article.
example: edit'는 (출판이나 공개 발표를 위해) (문서, 영상 등의) 내용을 '검토'하고 '수정'하거나 '편집한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Please edit this report for any grammatical errors before submission.
sentence: Please ____ any spelling errors before submitting the report.

meaning: They eliminated unnecessary steps.
example: eliminate'는 (불필요하거나 원치 않는 것을) '완전히 없애거나' '제거한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The new software helped us eliminate many manual data entry tasks.
sentence: We must ____ unnecessary steps from the process.

meaning: They embarked on a new journey.
example: embark'는 (특히 배나 비행기에) '올라타거나' '탑승한다'는 의미의 동사입니다. (('embark on': ~을 시작하다)로도 자주 쓰임)\r\n Passengers must check in at least one hour before they embark.
sentence: They will ____ on a new business trip next week.

meaning: The company embraced new technology.
example: embrace'는 (껴안다)는 의미 외에, (새로운 생각, 변화, 기술 등을) '기꺼이 받아들인다'는 의미로 자주 쓰이는 동사입니다.\r\n Our company must embrace new technologies to stay competitive.
sentence: Let’s ____ new ideas and changes with confidence.

meaning: A new leader emerged. / He emerged from the crisis.
example: emerge'는 (숨어있던 것이나 새로운 사실/현상이) '밖으로 나오거나' '알려진다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n New market trends are beginning to emerge.
sentence: A clear pattern began to ____ from the data.

meaning: The machine emits heat.
example: emit'는 (빛, 열, 가스, 소리 등을) '밖으로 내보내거나' '방출한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The factory was fined for emitting illegal levels of chemicals.
sentence: Cars that ____ smoke will fail the inspection.

meaning: He emphasized the importance of education.
example: emphasize'는 (특정 사항의 중요성을) '분명히 하거나' '강조한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The CEO emphasized the need for better customer service.
sentence: The teacher will ____ the importance of honesty.

meaning: Please enclose your resume with the letter.
example: enclose'는 (편지 봉투나 소포 안에) (문서나 물건을) '함께 넣어 보낸다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Please find the signed contract enclosed with this letter.
sentence: Please ____ your résumé with the application.

meaning: They encountered several difficulties.
example: encounter'는 (특히 예상치 못한 문제나 어려움)을 '만나거나' '부딪힌다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We encountered an unexpected problem with the new software.
sentence: We may ____ some problems during the project.

meaning: The teacher encouraged students to participate.
example: encourage'는 (어떤 행동을 하도록) '용기를 주거나' '하도록 권장/장려한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The company encourages employees to take training courses.
sentence: Parents should ____ children to read more.

meaning: The policy enhanced efficiency.
example: enhance'는 (이미 좋은 것을) '더 좋게' 만들거나 (가치, 품질, 매력 등을) '향상시킨다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We need to enhance the security features of our website.
sentence: New tools can ____ work efficiency.

meaning: They enlarged the image. / The company enlarged rapidly.
example: enlarge'는 (규모나 크기를) '더 크게' 만들거나 '확대한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The company plans to enlarge its production facility next year.
sentence: They plan to ____ the office space next year.

meaning: She enrolled in the class. / The school enrolled 200 students in the program.
example: enroll'은 (강좌, 프로그램, 학교 등에) '이름을 올리거나' '등록한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n You can enroll in the workshop by visiting our website.
sentence: You can ____ in the evening class online.

meaning: The host entertained the guests.
example: entertain'은 (특히 비즈니스 관련 손님을) '즐겁게' 해주거나 '접대한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We need to book a suitable restaurant to entertain our clients.
sentence: The show aims to ____ and educate the audience.

meaning: She entrusted him with the documents.
example: entrust'는 (중요한 일이나 책임을) (신뢰하는 사람에게) '맡긴다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The manager entrusted her assistant with the important task.
sentence: We will ____ him with this important task.

meaning: The lab was equipped with new instruments.
example: equip'는 (어떤 목적에 필요한) '장비나 물품을 제공하거나' '갖춘다'는 의미의 동사입니다. (주로 'be equipped with' 형태로 쓰임)\r\n The new office rooms are equipped with the latest technology.
sentence: All rooms are ____ with air conditioning.

meaning: They established a new branch.
example: establish'는 (회사, 조직, 제도, 명성 등을) '만들거나' '확고히' 한다는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Our goal is to establish a strong presence in the Asian market.
sentence: They plan to ____ a new branch in Busan.

meaning: They estimated that costs would rise.
example: estimate'는 (가치, 비용, 수량 등을) '어림잡아 계산'하거나 '추정한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We need to estimate the total cost of the project.
sentence: We can’t ____ the total cost yet.

meaning: The committee evaluated the proposal.
example: evaluate'는 (어떤 것의 가치, 품질, 성과 등을) '판단'하거나 '평가한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We will evaluate each candidate's performance during the interview.
sentence: The team will ____ the results next week.

meaning: Profits exceeded expectations.
example: exceed'는 (특정 수량, 한도, 기대를) '넘어서거나' '초과한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Total sales for this quarter exceeded our expectations.
sentence: Your performance will ____ our expectations.

meaning: She excels in mathematics.
example: excel'은 (특정 분야나 활동에서) '남보다 뛰어나거나' '탁월한' 능력을 보인다는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Ms. Kim excels at finding creative solutions to problems.
sentence: She hopes to ____ in her new position.

meaning: Please excuse me for being late.
example: excuse'는 (사소한 잘못이나 결례, 결석 등을) '이해'하고 '넘어가 준다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Please excuse Mr. Smith's absence; he is attending an urgent meeting.
sentence: Please ____ me for being late.

meaning: The company executed the plan efficiently.
example: execute'는 (계획, 명령, 업무 등을) '계획대로' '실행'하거나 '수행한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The team successfully executed the marketing plan.
sentence: He will ____ the plan as scheduled.

meaning: He was exempted from taxes.
example: exempt'는 (법적 의무, 규칙, 세금 등으로부터) '면제'된다는 의미의 형용사입니다.\r\n Non-profit organizations are exempt from paying taxes.
sentence: Part-time workers are ____ from this policy.

meaning: You should exercise caution.
example: exercise'는 (운동)이라는 뜻 외에, (권한, 권리, 주의력 등을) '사용'하거나 '발휘한다'는 의미의 동사로도 쓰입니다.\r\n Managers must exercise caution when handling sensitive client data.
sentence: Try to ____ regularly to stay healthy.

meaning: The museum exhibited modern art.
example: exhibit'는 (상품, 예술품 등을) (공개적인 장소에서) '보여주거나' '전시한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The company will exhibit its new products at the trade show.
sentence: The museum will ____ a new art collection.

meaning: The company expanded rapidly. / They expanded operations.
example: expand'는 (사업, 규모, 시장 등을) '더 크게' 만들거나 '확장한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We are planning to expand our business into international markets.
sentence: Our company hopes to ____ into new markets.

meaning: We need to expedite the process.
example: expedite'는 (어떤 과정이나 일의 진행을) '더 빠르게' 만들거나 '신속히 처리한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We paid an extra fee to expedite the shipping of our order.
sentence: We need to ____ the process to meet the deadline.

meaning: The team experimented with new materials.
example: experiment'는 (새로운 아이디어나 방법의 효과를 알아보기 위한) '시험'이나 '실험'을 의미하는 명사입니다.\r\n The marketing team is conducting an experiment with social media ads.
sentence: The team will ____ with a new design model.

meaning: The contract expired last month.
example: expire'는 (정해진 기간이나 유효 기한이) '끝나거나' '만료된다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n My current employment contract will expire at the end of this month.
sentence: My passport will ____ next month.

meaning: They explored the new market.
example: explore'는 (새로운 가능성, 방법, 장소 등을) '알아보거나' '탐색한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n We need to explore new ways to reduce our operating costs.
sentence: Let’s ____ the cave carefully during the tour.

meaning: The report exposed the company to criticism.
example: expose'는 (위험/유해한 것에) '노출시키다'는 의미, 혹은 (새로운 경험/지식 등을) '접하게 한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n Working on this project will expose you to new management techniques.
sentence: Do not ____ sensitive data to the public.

meaning: We extended the deadline. / The road extends to the coast.
example: extend'는 (마감 기한, 계약 기간 등을) '더 길게' 만들거나 '연장한다'는 의미의 동사입니다.\r\n The manager agreed to extend the deadline for the report.
sentence: We will ____ the deadline by two weeks.
